articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Trump says US struck another ‘drug smuggling vessel’, killing three - Al Jazeera
articles.description: US president says American forces struck the vessel in the Southern Command’s ‘area of responsibility’.
articles.content: United States President Donald Trump says American forces have carried out another strike targeting a ship that he claimed was trafficking illicit narcotics, killing at least three men on board the v… [+3252 chars]
